section.title: Requirements
section.p: You need to install java first to run XPontus. You can download java at http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/download.jsp

section.title: Using the Windows installer

It is a classic windows installer with an uninstaller provided

section.title: Using the Unix installer
section.p: The installer is a self extracting archive
It is the same as the cross-platform installer but you don't need to run the java command
If you are using gnome, kde or xfce, open your file explorer and change the installer file permissions to make it executable. After that, double-click on the installer and choose to run it.
